PROTEIN GRANOLA WITH COCONUT YOGURT

Crunchy homemade protein granola served over creamy coconut yogurt. A satisfying dairy-free breakfast with 26g plant-based protein.

26g
Protein
420
Calories
40m
Total Time
8
Yield

Nutrition per 1 bowl

Carbs38g
Fat20g
Fiber6g
Sugar12g
Sodium85mg
DifficultyEasy

INGREDIENTS

  • 200g gluten-free rolled oats
  • 90g (3 scoops) vanilla plant protein powder
  • 100g raw almonds, roughly chopped
  • 60g pumpkin seeds
  • 60g unsweetened coconut flakes
  • 80ml coconut oil, melted
  • 80ml maple syrup
  • 5g cinnamon
  • 3g vanilla extract
  • Pinch of salt
  • Per serving: 150g coconut yogurt

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Prep

Preheat oven to 325F. Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper.

2

Mix Dry

In a large bowl, combine oats, protein powder, almonds, pumpkin seeds, coconut flakes, cinnamon, and salt.

3

Add Wet

Drizzle coconut oil, maple syrup, and vanilla over dry ingredients. Stir until everything is evenly coated.

4

Bake

Spread in an even layer on prepared baking sheet. Bake 20-25 minutes, stirring halfway, until golden brown.

5

Cool

Let cool completely on the pan - it will crisp up as it cools.

6

Serve

Store granola in airtight container. Serve 60g granola over 150g coconut yogurt with fresh berries.
